message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's split it evenly, it's the fairest way to go.
I'll take a bit more, since you didn't accept my previous offer.
Let's try that 50/50 split again. Inflation is a real thing, and we both lose if we don't come to an agreement.
You're losing value, I'm not. Take this before it gets worse.
I'm willing to budge a little, but I need to get a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's split it 45/55.
Every round you wait, you lose more. I'm being generous here.
I'm getting desperate here. We're both losing money. This is my final offer - 40/60, or we risk getting nothing at all.
